meanings.definition: the skill or ability of a showman
meanings.sent1: His showmanships on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The magician's showmanships amazed everyone in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: With his showmanships, he turned a simple act into a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent4: Her showmanships were like a masterful painting, each movement deliberate and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The showmanships of the ringmaster made the circus come alive with wonder.

meanings.definition: the act or practice of being a showman
meanings.sent1: The showmanships of the entertainer were evident in every aspect of the show.
meanings.sent2: His showmanships shone through in the way he engaged the audience.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's showmanships made even the simplest jokes hilarious.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marketing, showmanships play a crucial role in attracting customers.
meanings.sent5: The showmanships of the actor brought life to the character on stage.
